before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vmkh","text":"This protocol assumes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ssn7","text":"Your sample is loaded, locked, tuned for both proton and carbon channels, and shimmed in the magnet","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doffu","text":"The calibrated 90° pulse value for proton (i.e., P1) for the sample has been collected","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"50qeo","text":"This is a protocol for running the Bruker pulse program \"hmbcetgpl3nd\" for metabolomics samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdsvr","text":"This protocol intends to provide concise instructions to carry out the experiment. For more comprehensive information, see Bruker's documentation \"Basic NMR Experiments\" by clicking ? →  Manuals (docs) on the menu bar on TopSpin. See also \"Pulse Program Catalogue. 1D/2D\" for the details about the pulse program used in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":182,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":187,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
